C

Converter - Interface in de.aikiit.spamprotector
Main interface to define spam replacement strategies.

D

de.aikiit.spamprotector - package de.aikiit.spamprotector
Base package of this tool, contains the application as applet or standalone.
de.aikiit.spamprotector.util - package de.aikiit.spamprotector.util
 

G

GUI - Class in de.aikiit.spamprotector
This class contains the main UI of this application (both input windows and all command buttons).
GUI(boolean) - Constructor for class de.aikiit.spamprotector.GUI
Launches and configures the main UI component, while taking care whether the application is started as an applet or standalone.

I

init() - Method in class de.aikiit.spamprotector.AntiSpamApplet
Loads UI for this applet.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class de.aikiit.spamprotector.AntiSpamApplication
Main method that loads the application in a proper size.

R

replaceString(String) - Method in class de.aikiit.spamprotector.AsciiConverter
Replaces each character with its ASCII-code representation or does nothing if character is not in the range of 'normal' characters.
replaceString(String) - Method in interface de.aikiit.spamprotector.Converter
Main method to replace a given input (not encoded) and returns the converted input.

V

Version - Class in de.aikiit.spamprotector.util
this is generated during the build it contains the current version of the plugin for use in any output.
